wikipedia_page.main: Jonathan Tomlinson (born 1 July 1982) is a Welsh international lawn bowler.

link_mentions.page: Lawn bowls at the 2014 Commonwealth Games
Lawn bowls at the 2014 Commonwealth Games – Men's triples
Lawn bowls at the 2014 Commonwealth Games – Men's fours
response: ||2||align=left|||Mark Harding, Paul TaylorJonathan Tomlinson, Marc Wyatt

He competed for Wales in the men's triples at the 2014 Commonwealth Games where he won a bronze medal with Jonathan Tomlinson and Marc Wyatt. In 2015 he won the triples silver medal and fours bronze medal at the Atlantic Bowls Championships.

In 2016, Thulborn became the World Singles Champion of Champions defeating Jonathan Tomlinson of Wales in the final. He is twice the winner of the fours event at Australian National Bowls Championships (2015 & 2016).
